text: (Arra igai ni kamigami o) suhai suru mono wa iudearou. `Arra ga o konomi ni nara rerunaraba, watashi-tachi mo sosen mo (hoka no kamigami o) agamezu, mata nani mo kinjinakattadearou ni.' Kono yo ni kare-ra izen no mono mo, ware no chobatsu o ajiwau made wa (Mari) o shinjinakatta. Itte yaru ga i. `Anata gata wa, hatashite chishiki ga aru no ka. Sorenara watashi-tachi ni gen wase. Anata gata wa, tada okusoku ni shitagau dake. Hontoni anata gata wa, shinjitsude wanai koto o iu nisuginai
